content: Hi Eitan! How do you handle stressful situations where multiple customers need help simultaneously?
Hi Eitan! What do you enjoy most about working with people, aside from the occasional opportunity for heroic patience training?
Hi Eitan! Can you tell me about a time you had to solve a problem on your feet—aside from deciding what to have for lunch?
Hi Eitan! What do you think makes great customer service, aside from remembering to say "please" and "thank you"?
